 12#define VSIP_CORE_EXPR_UNARY_BLOCK_HPP

 22namespace vsip_csl

 24namespace expr

 26
 27/// Unary expression block type.
 28///
 29/// Template parameters:
 30///   :Operation: Unary operation. Parametrized on value-type
 31///               for elementwise operation, or on block otherwise.
 32///   :Block: The argument block.
 33///   :Elementwise: True if this is an elementwise operation.
 34template <template <typename> class Operation,
 35	  typename Block,
 36	  bool Elementwise = false>
 37class Unary;
 38
 39/// Unary expression block specialization for elementwise operations.
 40template <template <typename> class Operation, typename Block>
 41class Unary<Operation, Block, true> : impl::Non_assignable
 42{
 43  typedef typename Block::value_type argument_type;
 44  typedef Operation<argument_type> operation_type;
 45
 46public:
 47  static dimension_type const dim = Block::dim;
 48  typedef typename operation_type::result_type value_type;
 49
 50  typedef value_type& reference_type;
 51  typedef value_type const& const_reference_type;
 52  typedef typename Block::map_type map_type;
 53
 54  Unary(Block const& block) : block_(block) {}
 55  Unary(operation_type const &op, Block const &block)
 56    : operation_(op), block_(block) {}
 57
 58  length_type size() const VSIP_NOTHROW { return block_.size();}
 59  length_type size(dimension_type block_dim, dimension_type d) const VSIP_NOTHROW
 60  { return block_.size(block_dim, d);}
 61  void increment_count() const VSIP_NOTHROW {}
 62  void decrement_count() const VSIP_NOTHROW {}
 63  map_type const& map() const VSIP_NOTHROW { return block_.map();}
 64
 65  operation_type const &operation() const { return operation_;}
 66  Block const &arg() const VSIP_NOTHROW {return block_;}
 67
 68  value_type get(index_type i) const
 69  { return this->operation()(this->arg().get(i));}
 70  value_type get(index_type i, index_type j) const
 71  { return this->operation()(this->arg().get(i, j));}
 72  value_type get(index_type i, index_type j, index_type k) const
 73  { return this->operation()(this->arg().get(i, j, k));}
 74
 75private:
 76  Operation<argument_type> operation_;
 77  typename impl::View_block_storage<Block>::expr_type block_;
 78};
 79
 80
 81/// Unary expression block specialization for non-elementwise operations.
 82template <template <typename> class Operation,
 83	  typename Block>
 84class Unary<Operation, Block, false> : public impl::Non_assignable
 85{
 86  typedef Dense<Operation<Block>::dim,
 87		typename Operation<Block>::result_type> cache_type;
 88public:
 89  static dimension_type const dim = Operation<Block>::dim;
 90  typedef typename Operation<Block>::result_type value_type;
 91
 92  typedef value_type &reference_type;
 93  typedef value_type const &const_reference_type;
 94  typedef typename Block::map_type map_type;
 95
 96  Unary(Operation<Block> const &op) : operation_(op) {}
 97  Unary(Unary const &b) : operation_(b.operation_) {}
 98
 99  length_type size() const VSIP_NOTHROW { return operation_.size();}
100  length_type size(dimension_type block_dim, dimension_type d) const VSIP_NOTHROW
101  { return operation_.size(block_dim, d);}
102  void increment_count() const VSIP_NOTHROW {}
103  void decrement_count() const VSIP_NOTHROW {}
104  map_type const &map() const VSIP_NOTHROW { return operation_.map();}
105
106  Operation<Block> const &operation() const { return operation_;}
107  Block const &arg() const VSIP_NOTHROW {return operation_.arg();}
108
109  value_type get(index_type i) const
110  { 
111    assert(cache_.get());
112    return cache_->get(i);
113  }
114  value_type get(index_type i, index_type j) const
115  { 
116    assert(cache_.get());
117    return cache_->get(i, j);
118  }
119  value_type get(index_type i, index_type j, index_type k) const
120  { 
121    assert(cache_.get());
122    return cache_->get(i, j, k);
123  }
124
125  /// Evaluate the operation to make this type usable as an ordinary block.
126  void evaluate() const
127  {
128    if (!cache_.get())
129    {
130      cache_.reset(new cache_type(impl::block_domain<dim>(operation_)));
131      operation_.apply(*(cache_.get()));
132    }
133  }
134  /// Evaluate the operation into the given result block.
135  template <typename ResultBlock>
136  void apply(ResultBlock &result) const
137  {
138    // If this expression was already evaluated,
139    // just copy the cached result.
140    if (cache_.get()) impl::assign<dim>(result, *cache_);
141    else operation_.apply(result);
142  }
143
144private:
145  Operation<Block> operation_;
146  mutable std::auto_ptr<cache_type> cache_;
147};
148
149} // namespace vsip_csl::expr
150} // namespace vsip_csl

152namespace vsip

156namespace expr = vsip_csl::expr;
157
158/// Specialize Is_expr_block for unary expr blocks.
159template <template <typename> class O, typename B, bool E>
160struct Is_expr_block<expr::Unary<O, B, E> >
161{ static bool const value = true; };
162
163/// Specialize View_block_storage to control how views store unary
164/// expression blocks.
165template <template <typename> class O, typename B, bool E>
166struct View_block_storage<expr::Unary<O, B, E> const>
167  : By_value_block_storage<expr::Unary<O, B, E> const>
168{};
169
170/// Use of non-const expr::Unary<> is an error.
171template <template <typename> class O, typename B, bool E>
172struct View_block_storage<expr::Unary<O, B, E> > 
173{};
174

177/***********************************************************************
178  Parallel traits and functions
179***********************************************************************/
180
181template <template <typename> class O, typename B, bool E>
182struct Distributed_local_block<expr::Unary<O, B, E> const>
183{
184  typedef expr::Unary<O, typename Distributed_local_block<B>::type, E> const
185  type;
186  typedef expr::Unary<O, typename Distributed_local_block<B>::proxy_type, E> const
187  proxy_type;
188};
189
190  template <template <typename> class O, typename B, bool E>
191struct Distributed_local_block<expr::Unary<O, B, E> >
192{
193  typedef expr::Unary<O, typename Distributed_local_block<B>::type, E> 
194  type;
195  typedef expr::Unary<O, typename Distributed_local_block<B>::proxy_type, E>
196  proxy_type;
197};
198
199template <template <typename> class O, typename B>
200expr::Unary<O, typename Distributed_local_block<B>::type, true>
201get_local_block(expr::Unary<O, B, true> const &block)
202{
203  typedef expr::Unary<O, typename Distributed_local_block<B>::type, true>
204    block_type;
205
206  return block_type(get_local_block(block.arg()));
207}
208
209template <template <typename> class O, typename B>
210expr::Unary<O, typename Distributed_local_block<B>::type, false>
211get_local_block(expr::Unary<O, B, false> const &block)
212{
213  typedef expr::Unary<O, typename Distributed_local_block<B>::type, false>
214    block_type;
215  typename O<B>::local_type local_operation(block.operation().local());
216  block_type local_block(local_operation);
217  return local_block;
218}
219
220
221template <typename                  CombineT,
222	  template <typename> class O, typename B, bool E>
223struct Combine_return_type<CombineT, expr::Unary<O, B, E> const>
224{
225  typedef expr::Unary<O, typename Combine_return_type<CombineT, B>::tree_type,
226		      E> const tree_type;
227  typedef tree_type type;
228};
229
230
231
232template <typename                  CombineT,
233	  template <typename> class O, typename B, bool E>
234struct Combine_return_type<CombineT, expr::Unary<O, B, E> >
235  : Combine_return_type<CombineT, expr::Unary<O, B, E> const>
236{};
237
238template <typename                  CombineT,
239	  template <typename> class O, typename B, bool E>
240typename Combine_return_type<CombineT, expr::Unary<O, B, E> const>::type
241apply_combine(CombineT const &combine, expr::Unary<O, B, E> const &block)
242{
243  typedef typename Combine_return_type<CombineT,
244    expr::Unary<O, B, E> const>::type
245    block_type;
246
247  return block_type(apply_combine(combine, block.arg()));
248}
249
250template <typename                  VisitorT,
251	  template <typename> class O, typename B, bool E>
252void
253apply_leaf(VisitorT const &visitor,
254	   expr::Unary<O, B, E> const& block)
255{
256  apply_leaf(visitor, block.arg());
257}
258
259template <dimension_type D,
260	  typename M,
261	  template <typename> class O, typename B>
262struct Is_par_same_map<D, M, expr::Unary<O, B, true> const>
263{
264  typedef expr::Unary<O, B, true> const block_type;
265
266  static bool value(M const &map, block_type &block)
267  {
268    return Is_par_same_map<D, M, B>::value(map, block.arg());
269  }
270};
271
272template <dimension_type D,
273	  typename M,
274	  template <typename> class O, typename B>
275struct Is_par_same_map<D, M, expr::Unary<O, B, false> const>
276{
277  typedef expr::Unary<O, B, false> const block_type;
278
279  static bool value(M const &map, block_type &block)
280  {
281    return Is_par_same_map<D, M, O<B> >::value(map, block.operation());
282  }
283};
284
285template <template <typename> class O, typename B>
286struct Is_par_reorg_ok<expr::Unary<O, B, true> const>
287{
288  static bool const value = Is_par_reorg_ok<B>::value;
289};
290
291template <template <typename> class O, typename B>
292struct Is_par_reorg_ok<expr::Unary<O, B, false> const>
293{
294  static bool const value = false;
295};
